mapper.insert:
insert into test_questions (subject_id,question,option1,option2,option3,option4,correct_answer,question_img_url, solution,solution_img_url,weightage,negative_marks,created_date,question_type,exam_type,
chapter,
institute_id,
topic_id,
board_id,
class_id,
level,
short_explanation, ref_id, que_status) values (${subjectId},'${question}','${option1}','${option2}','${option3}','${option4}','${correctAnswer}','${questionImageUrl}', '${solution}','${solutionImageUrl}',${weightage},${negativeMarks},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'${type}','${examType}',
${chapter.chapterId},
${instituteId},
${topicId},
${level},
${board_id},
${class_id},
'${short_explanation}', '${referenceId}', '${status}')

insert into questions_details (question_id, name_of_publication, page_number, paragraph_number,line_no, self_created, neet_no_of_ques, jee_no_of_ques, setter_id, mht_cet_no_of_ques,setter_criteria, setter_question_type, setter_difficulty_level) values (${id}, '${details.name_of_publication}', '${details.page_number}', '${details.paragraph_number}', '${details.line_no}', ${details.self_created}, ${details.neet_no_of_ques}, ${details.jee_no_of_ques}, ${details.setter_id}, ${details.mht_cet_no_of_ques}, '${details.setter_criteria}', '${details.setter_question_type}', '${details.setter_difficulty_level}')
mapper.select: select count(*) from test_questions where chapter = ${value};
select count(*) from test_questions where created_date >= '${value}';
select * from test_questions where exam_type like '%${examType}%' AND subject_id = ${subjectId} AND status = 'A';
mapper.update:
update test_questions set question_img_url = '${questionImageUrl}', solution_img_url = '${solutionImageUrl}'
, option1_img_url = '${option1ImageUrl}'
, option2_img_url = '${option2ImageUrl}'
, option3_img_url = '${option3ImageUrl}'
, option4_img_url = '${option4ImageUrl}'
where id = ${id}
mapper.insert:
insert into test_questions (subject_id,question,option1,option2,option3,option4,correct_answer,question_img_url, solution,weightage,negative_marks,created_date,question_type,exam_type,chapter, level, ref_id) values
(${question.subjectId},'${question.question}','${question.option1}','${question.option2}','${question.option3}','${question.option4}','${question.correctAnswer}','${question.questionImageUrl}', '${question.solution}',${question.weightage},${question.negativeMarks},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'${question.type}','${question.examType}',${question.chapter.chapterId}, ${question.level}, '${question.referenceId}')
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM test_questions WHERE subject_id = ${subjectId}
AND chapter = ${chapterId}
AND (question like '%$$%' OR option1 like '%$$%' OR option2 like '%$$%' OR option3 like '%$$%' OR option4 like '%$$%' OR solution like '%$$%') AND (
question like '%${keyword}%'
OR
option1 like '%${keyword}%'
OR
option2 like '%${keyword}%'
OR
option3 like '%${keyword}%'
OR
option4 like '%${keyword}%'
OR
solution like '%${keyword}%'
)
mapper.insert:
insert into test_questions_map (test_id,question_id,created_date,question_number,section, weightage, negative_marks) values
${test.id}, ${question.id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ${question.qn_id}, '${question.subject}', ${question.weightage}, ${question.negativeMarks}

insert into exam_feedback (feedback, created_date,
question_id,
test_id,
chapter_id,
subject_id,
video_id,
type, student_id, institute_id) values ('${test.currentQuestion.feedback.feedback}', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
${test.currentQuestion.id},
${test.id},
${test.currentQuestion.chapter.chapterId},
${test.currentQuestion.subjectId},
${test.currentQuestion.feedback.id},
'${test.currentQuestion.feedback.type}', ${student.id}, ${student.instituteId});
mapper.update: update exam_feedback set attachment_link = '${attachment}' where id = ${id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
count(*) as frequency,
question, question_img_url,resolution,test_questions.id, feedback_resolution_text,feedback_resolution_video_url, exam_feedback.subject_Id, exam_feedback.created_date,feedback_resolution_text, test_subjects.subject,chapter_name, updated_date, feedback_resolution_image_url, feedback
,student.name as answeredBy,exam_feedback.id as feedbackId,attachment_link
FROM exam_feedback join test_questions on exam_feedback.question_id = test_questions.id left join test_subjects on test_subjects.subject_id = exam_feedback.subject_id left join chapters on exam_feedback.chapter_id = chapters.id
left join student on exam_feedback.answered_by = student.id
where 1
AND resolution is NULL
AND resolution is NOT NULL
AND exam_feedback.created_date between '${fromDate}' AND '${toDate}'
AND student_id = ${student.id}
AND student_id in (select student_id from student_institute where institute_id = ${institute.id} AND package_id in ( select package_id from student_institute where student_id = ${student.id}))
AND exam_feedback.subject_id = ${subjectId}
AND exam_feedback.chapter_id = ${question.chapter.chapterId}
AND exam_feedback.institute_id = ${institute.id}
group by question_id
order by exam_feedback.created_date desc;

SELECT distinct exam_feedback.subject_id,subject FROM exam_feedback join test_subjects on exam_feedback.subject_id = test_subjects.subject_id where 1
AND student_id = ${student.id}
AND student_id in (select student_id from student_institute where institute_id = ${institute.id} AND package_id in ( select package_id from student_institute where student_id = ${student.id}))
AND question_id is NOT NULL
AND video_id is NOT NULL
AND video_id is null AND question_id is NULL
